page.title: 16STREET GAMES IN LANGHOLM
page.content: THE CHILDREN IN {LANGHOLM }OFTEN MEET TOGETHER IN THE STREET AND DECIDE TO PLAY A GAME.COMMON GAMES ARE PLAYED LIKE {TIG,HIDE AND SEEK, TARGET (BALL {AGAINST A WALL),HOP SCOTCH,PIGGY IN {THE MIDDLE,TIG,DONKEY }AND {LEAP {FROG.} ONE OF THE UNUSUAL LOCAL GAMES IS{JACK FLASH.}THIS IS A HIDE AND SEEK GAME PLAYED IN THE DARK AND YOU NEED A TORCH.THE CATCHER USES THE TORCH.THE OTHER PEOPLE HIDE.THE CATCHER SHINES THE TORCH IN PLACES.IF IT SHINES ON SOMEONE HE IS CAUGHT.THIS GOES ON UNTIL EVERY ONE IS CAUGHT. THE FIRST PERSON CAUGHT IS CATCHER IN THE NEXT GAME. YOU CAN PLAY THIS GAME WHEN IT'S TOO DARK TO PLAY ANYTHING ELSE.
